description: Erection of a roof extension together with change of use of second and third floors from B1 to provide for 7 self contained flats.
decision_conditions: REASON: The change of use of the second and third floor would result in the loss of occupied Class B1 office accommodation in the Central Activities Zone that is considered suitable for occupation by small and medium sized enterprises and would be contrary to policies E4 (Loss of business use), E13 (Protection of Premises for Small Firms and Opportunities for Business Start Ups) and H3 (New housing and changes of use to residential) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, policies CS7 (Bunhill and Clerkenwell) and CS13 (Employment spaces) of the Islington Core Strategy 2011 and policies 2.10 (Central Activities Zone – strategic priorities), 2.11 (Central Activities Zone – strategic functions), 2.12 (Central Activities Zone – predominantly local activities), 2.13 (Opportunity areas and intensification areas), 4.1 (Developing London’s economy) and 4.2 (Offices) of the London Plan 2011.
